resources.string:
Smart Cookie Secure Web Browser 
 - Lightweight, Secure and Free - 
 Updates 1.0 to 2.7 made with Sketchware 
 Update 3.0 onwards made in Google and IntelliJ's 
 Android Studio 
 
 Made with code from the Lightning Browser 
 project, the Chromium project and the original Smart Cookie Web 
 
 Made by Cookie Jar Apps 
 A CookieGames company 
 https://cookiegames.co.uk
